member.name: DWM_SYSTEMBACKDROP_TYPE
member.summary: Flags for specifying the system-drawn backdrop material of a window, including behind the non-client area.

member.name: DWM_SYSTEMBACKDROP_TYPE.DWMSBT_AUTO
member.summary: The default. Let the Desktop Window Manager (DWM) automatically decide the system-drawn backdrop material for this window.

member.name: DWM_SYSTEMBACKDROP_TYPE.DWMSBT_MAINWINDOW
member.summary: Draw the backdrop material effect corresponding to a long-lived window.

member.name: DWM_SYSTEMBACKDROP_TYPE.DWMSBT_TRANSIENTWINDOW
member.summary: Draw the backdrop material effect corresponding to a transient window.

member.name: DWM_SYSTEMBACKDROP_TYPE.DWMSBT_TABBEDWINDOW
member.summary: Draw the backdrop material effect corresponding to a window with a tabbed title bar.
